Articles.Content:
Houston, I have problem.

mechjeb itself works perfectly but yesterday I accidently moved "orbital operations" off the screen.

I cannot pick it back into the screen.

How to solve?

thanks in advance
You really should ask this stuff in the respective thread, but try deleting your MechJeb.cfg in KSP_win/PluginData/mumechlib

thanks! it works!

I already did search but didnt find.

The search feature on this forum is crud.

BTW I suggest the Mechjeb manual http://wiki.mechjeb.com/index.php?title=Manual

It's a little out-of-date but it covers the important stuff.

OOPS sorry I previously linked to a old image that was still in my clipboard. I did not mean to intentionally insult you.

Edited September 11, 2012 by nhnifong
